TopicTitle: What would be a good 40K starter army?

Articles.Content: I'm thinking either orks or space marines.
Not sure what this relates to, but I'll say Orks... they're too dumb to understand money. You couldn't even get one dumb mercenary for 40K let alone a Marine. lol
Necrons, easy to paint, doesn't require knowing your opponent like other armies and reasonably tough

Save your money, and don't buy an army. Games Workshop products are horribly overpriced, and while playing may be fun at first, it soon gets boring.

Source: Personal experience

My first (and only) army was Necrons, by the way. They are pretty easy to paint.
